problems.title: Shortest Path in Unweighted Graph
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an unweighted undirected graph, find the shortest path distance from a source vertex to all other vertices.
Return an array where dist[i] is the shortest distance from source to vertex i. If a vertex is unreachable, set distance to -1.

starterCodes.code:
class Solution:
    def shortestPath(self, V, adj, src):
        # TODO: Return list of distances
        pass

if __name__ == '__main__':
    import sys
    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split('\n')
    V, E = map(int, data[0].split())
    adj = [[] for _ in range(V)]
    for i in range(E):
        u, v = map(int, data[i+1].split())
        adj[u].append(v)
        adj[v].append(u)
    src = int(data[E+1])
    sol = Solution()
    res = sol.shortestPath(V, adj, src)
    print(' '.join(map(str, res)))

hintsList: Maintain a distance array initialized to -1 (or infinity).
